basics.name: David Paquet Pitts
basics.headline: Technology Leader & Solution Architect
basics.summary: Technology leader with 20+ years of experience in web development, enterprise solutions, and team leadership. Proven track record of building high-retention technical teams and delivering innovative solutions.

work.name: OKAM
work.description: Founded and scaled a technology consultancy delivering enterprise solutions across North America
highlights: Grew organization to 25+ professionals across strategy, UX/UI, development, and architecture
Built high-retention technical teams (<10% turnover) delivering enterprise solutions focused on headless architecture and accessibility
Established development standards for multi-lingual and WCAG-compliant implementations
Pivoted agency to exclusively headless architecture in 2020, implementing Directus (self-hosted) and Sanity (cloud) CMS

work.name: PSSPRT Inc.
work.description: Led technical strategy and development of innovative mobile platform connecting craft breweries with consumers through digital passport system
highlights: Architected mobile application enabling QR-based redemption of craft beer samples at partner microbreweries
Developed white-label version of platform licensed to events industry in US market
Built scalable backend supporting multi-tenant deployment and custom branding
Successfully positioned technology for acquisition by events enterprise

work.name: HiSports
work.description: Led technical strategy and development of sports management platform from concept to successful acquisition
highlights: Architected and implemented offline-first mobile application using Ionic Framework
Designed Redux-based state management enabling robust offline data synchronization
Built real-time scoring and statistics tracking system with event-sourcing architecture
Successfully positioned platform for acquisition by sports technology company in 2019

work.name: Desjardins Financial Group
work.description: Led technical implementation of Google Analytics Premium across enterprise digital properties
highlights: Spearheaded one of Canada's first Google Analytics Premium implementations across 20 initiatives in $500M+ program
Developed and documented integration library for standardized analytics implementation
Collaborated with BI team to ensure data architecture met enterprise dashboarding requirements
Led technical specifications and implementation standards pre-Google Tag Manager era

work.name: National Bank of Canada
work.description: Progressed through multiple roles in web expertise and intranet services, focusing on technical leadership and analytics

projects.name: ScopeCraft
projects.description: AI-powered tool that transforms project briefs into personalized questionnaires
highlights: Built in one day with Vercel's v0

projects.name: Directus SurveyJS Integration
projects.description: Open-source module enabling dynamic form management in Directus CMS

projects.name: AI-Augmented CMS Workflows
projects.description: Automation suite for content management using AI-powered tools

projects.name: Remote Development Infrastructure
projects.description: Secure containerized development environment for distributed teams

projects.name: Enterprise Chatbot Platform
projects.description: Conversational AI platform for enterprise client services
